item.title: Optimizing TCP Performance with Version Control and Virtual Machines
item.description: Listen to the interview with our engineer: Optimizing TCP Performance with Version Control and Virtual Machines Introduction Welcome back to another exciting post on the ShitOps engineering blog, where we dive deep into all things tech and explore groundbreaking solutions that are sure to revolutionize the industry. Today, we will tackle a pressing problem faced by our company—suboptimal TCP performance—and present an innovative solution that will undoubtedly blow your mind.
